about_the_game:
The main game and other DLC already added a lot of pretty girls and monsters into your game play, but the cool life could not be without male characters.

With this Sexy boys DLC you will get 10 handsome undressable male characters with working genitals, and settings to make their bodies even better.

They are different, with the different clothes, hairstyle etc to give you a better choice.

Fully functional genitals means that their penises are very realistic, and you can manage their size and erection with settings according to your idea and situation.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the Play mode you can replace main character on scene.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC characters are completely naked and have working genitals.
